STEP 4 - BIAS SEVERITY ASSESSMENT: The primary bias appears to be a mild form of anxiety influencing her perception and reporting. The severity of bias is mild; her responses are consistent and detailed enough for clinical assessment, though her nervousness might slightly dampen the depth of her disclosures. Her concern about the progression may be amplified internally more than she expresses outwardly; her worry may be greater than what she conveys verbally.
